title: MD
biography: Anders Björklund (born 11 July 1945) is a Swedish neuroscientist and pioneer in the study of cell- and gene-based reparative and neuroprotective mechanisms in the brain. He has spent his academic career at Lund University in Sweden, as professor since 1983 and as senior professor at the Wallenberg Neuroscience Center since his formal retirement in 2012.
aiSummary: Anders Björklund is a neurology specialist with an H-index of 159 at Wallenberg Wood Science Center (facility). Has been published in Nature Medicine, Trends in Neurosciences, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Sweden.
